casebody.data:
CITY OF HICKORY
v.
Willie James GRIMES, National Casualty Company, Travelers Indemnity Company, North Carolina Insurance Guaranty Association, Argonaut Great Central Insurance Company, Twin City Fire Insurance Company, and TIG Insurance Company No. 212P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 20, 2018. Paul E. Culpepper, Attorney at Law, for City of Hickory. Burton Craige, Narendra K. Ghosh, Paul E. Smith, Attorneys at Law, for Grimes, Willie James. Walter E. Brock, Jr., Andrew P. Flynt, Attorneys at Law, for Argonaut Great Central Insurance Company.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 10th of July 2018 by Defendant (Argonaut Great Central Insurance Company) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of September 2018."
